author: A_Brickset_user
title: the Omo Lego-tub
review: The 4538 box contains a marvellous set of lego-pieces. It even compensates that it only comes with the standard manual for 4026/4027.  The box has the standard lego-pieces, but also has very special elements. A good expansion to your excisting set. It would have been perfect though if it had a manual suitable for the pieces.

author: A_Brickset_user
title: With Thanks to Marcel v/der Linden
review: At a supermarket in the Netherlands they sold this box for 3,99 euro, in some toy shops for 7,99. For 3,99 is this a great set . It has 2 sacks of normal pieces (2*4,red) and 2 sacks of special random pieces (fences, roofpieces, something like that.
